issue.title: Loosing itemid between components breaks active menu and breadcrumbs
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Loosing itemid between components breaks active menu and breadcrumbs:

In front end, when a user access the "resources" view from a menu, the item id is lost between components. The result is the loss of hierarchical navigation:
- breadcrumb doesn't work
- menus items aren't "active"

Working example:
If we edit a resource the hierarchy is kept: menu_entry -> resources -> one resource

Non working example:
If we edit a diffusion we move from com_easysdi_core to com_esysdi_shop, and loose itemid. Navigation is broken.

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

This not possible because of easySDI multi-component architecture.
Users that want to have visual continuity or working breadcrumb must hack their own way around.
